front.title: IEEE Recommended Practice for Measurement of Field Intensity Above 300 MC from Radio Frequency Industrial, Scientific, and Medical Equipment

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: The following topics are dealt with: field intensity measurement; standard measuring method; symbols, units and abbreviations; methods of measurement; antenna design; antenna gain measurements; associated measuring equipment; measurements on production equipment; measurement precautions and factors affecting measurement accuracy.
